item.description:
Run one, run all, get there, be there, laugh!

If you all haven't heard by now, I'll be running in the 113th Boston Marathon in less than a week as part of a fundraising effort for Youth Enrichment Services, the local non-profit I have volunteered at for the last 3 years.

As part of that, this Saturday, April 18th @ 8pm, Lost Marbles (the local improv troupe that includes myself and some of the other incubators) has donated their time to bring you all a great show at our usual practice space!

Lost Marbles will perform their wacky blend of short form improv games that include some of the games we've worked with at the incubator. And no worries, they'll def be some opportunities for some audience participation!

So it's time to

Run Fast & Get Lost!

Showtime = 8-9:30pm at The Democracy Center, 45 Mt. Auburn Street, Cambridge, MA

$10 donation at the door - all proceeds go to my marathon fundraising and straight back to the great kids over at Y.E.S.


For more info about YES and how else to donate, check out www.firstgiving.com/jasonjedrusiak
item.name: Lost Marbles presents Run Fast & Get Lost : Jason's Marathon Fundraising Show!!!
